Translations.Text: Mmektit ed Oebbi, deg ussan iauden. Win i$awlen di sin wussan, ur icciv ara; win iaailen, ur icciv ara, ma illa d win ipeezziben. Eezzbet i Oebbi. Cfut, ar $uoeS ara tepwafesrem
Yiwen ger imdanen, iaoeb ik umeslay is, $ef tmeddurt n ddunit. Irra Oebbi d Anagi, $ef wayen illan deg ul is. U neppa iqsee i tilla
Mi izzi, ad ikkat di tmurt, iwakken ad issefsed degs, ad isqucc igran akked lmal. Oebbi ur Ieemmel ara asefsed
Ma nnan as: "eezzeb i Oebbi"! A t tekcem lqwedoa ubekkav. Ad isteqnaa s Loahennama. A yir usu
Ger imdanen, win izzenzen iman is, issaram llza n Oebbi. Oebbi d Umain ar imdanen
A wid iumnen! Kecmet di tifrat s lekmal is, ur teddut d lateo n Cciian. Neppa, s tidep, d acengu nnwen n uuee
Ma teccvem, deffir n tisin ubeggen $uowen, cfut Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Day a poaoun kan, ad asen d Ias Oebbi, akked lmalayek, di tili usigna? Ad iuao lameo. Ar Oebbi ara u$alen lumuo
Steqsi At Isoail, aceal issekniyen iberrzen i sen Nefka. I win ipbeddilen tikci n Oebbi, deffir tisin is $uoes, ihi, Oebbi Iqsee deg uaaqeb
Wid ijehlen, ccebeen asen tameddurt n ddunit. Ttihin $ef wid iumnen. Wid ipeezziben ad ilin sennig sen, ass n tnekra. Oebbi Ip$iti win i S ihwan, s lufa

Llan imdanen d yiwen n lois. Iuzen ed Oebbi lambiyya ad beccoen, ad nabin. Issers ed, yidsen, Tazmamt s tidep, iwakken ad Ieudd ger medden, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden. I imgarraden fellas, siwa wid iwumi teppunefk, mbaad ma iusa ten id ubeggen. Ppemyasamen. Inha Oebbi wid iumnen deg wayen n tidep, i$ef mgarraden, s tsrie iS. Oebbi Inehhu win i S ihwan, s abrid uwqim

Day t$ilem a pkecmem Loennet, wanag ur kwen id iusi wayen id iusan ar wid i kwen id izwaren? Mmugren d lmeena, ccqa, zzelzla, armi inna umazan akked wid iumnen yides: "melmi laanaya n Oebbi"? Day, s tidep, ur d teqoib ara laanaya n Oebbi
Steqsan k $ef wayen ara fken. Ini: "ayen ara tefkem n lxio, i imawlan, i llzem, i igujilen, i igellilen, i w ar d iawi ubrid". Ayen ara txedmem n lxio, war ccekk, Ieoa t Oebbi
Iura fellawen umennu$, u neppa d ayen tkeohem. Ahat tkeohem ayen ilhan i kunwi, ahat teemmlem ayen n dir i kunwi. Oebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem

La k steqsayen ma ad yili umennu$ deg waggur ioqan. Ini: "amennu$ degs, d abekkav. Abekkav it i$elben, ar Oebbi, d assefoe$ $ef ubrid n Oebbi, d ankao is, u d ankao n Loamaa n Leaoam; d assuffe$, segs, imezda$ is". Ahewwel i$leb amennu$. Zgan a kwen pna$en, alamma swexxoen kwen, ma zemren, si ddin nnwen. Win, segwen, iff$en i ddin is, ad immet d ajehli. Widak, mean igiten nnsen di ddunit, di laxeot. Widak, d at tmes, degs, nitni, ad wekkoen
Ih, wid iumnen, win iunagen u juhden deg ubrid n Oebbi, widak ggunin aeunu n Oebbi. Oebbi Ipsemmie, Ipeunu
